title: Matthew Continetti: Republicans are ‘enforcing an attitudinal line’ and not a policy line
description: Matthew Continetti, senior fellow at the American Enterprise Institute and the author of “The Right: The Hundred-Year War for American Conservatism,” joins Chuck to talk about the Republican party’s coalition and the historical roots of conservativism.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Matthew Continetti, senior fellow at the American Enterprise Institute and the author of “The Right: The Hundred-Year War for American Conservatism,” joins Chuck to talk about the Republican party’s coalition and the historical roots of conservativism.
